1250830.name: Operencia: The Stolen Sun - Explorer's Pack
1250830.description:
This Explorer’s Pack is like finding your own personal treasure chest of Operencia loot:
  • FULL SOUNDTRACK: Accomplished Hungarian composer Arthur Grósz has crafted the soundtrack to complement the game’s inspiration from Central European legends and history. Listen to every minute of it, whenever you like.
  • DETAILED MAPS: Looking to 100% the game? These 13 maps will help immensely!
  • WALLPAPERS: Three beautiful pieces will take your desktop to where history meets legend.
